pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mouse cursors for the Catppuccin project. Based on Volantes cursors and adapted to use Catppuccin colours. Themes of all colours are available, in each of four flavours with varying border and line colour. From lightest to darkest, the flavours are Latte, Frappé, Macchiato, and Mocha.

use.flag: Install the Latte cursor themes (light grey border and line colour).
Install the Frappé cursor themes (dark grey border and line colour).
Install the Macchiato cursor themes (navy border and line colour).
Install the Mocha cursor themes (near-black border and line colour).
